comment: Projection Theorem: Any Hilbert space vector ` A ` can be decomposed uniquely into a member ` x ` of a closed subspace ` H ` and a member ` y ` of the complement of the subspace. Theorem 3.7(i) of [Beran] p. 102 (existence part). (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
